appDesc.message: üîêüí∞Cryptocurrency wallet for Tezos blockchain as Web Extension for your Browser.

clickToRevealOrEditField.message: Click to reveal or edit this field

delegatingMotivation.message: Delegating your funds to bakers is a great way of earning interest on your balance

depositToWalletDescription.message: Click on deposit method to get money on your wallet. Use faucet to get free coins!

contractNotAvailable.message: The contract at this address is not available. Does it exist on this network?

tokenDoesNotMatchStandard.message: Provided token contract doesn't match FA1.2 standard

addressOfDeployedTokenContract.message: Address of a deployed token contract.

tokenSymbolPatternDescription.message: Only a-z, A-Z, 0-9 chars allowed, 2-7 length

tokenSymbolInputDescription.message: Token symbol, like 'USD' for United States Dollar.

tokenNameInputDescription.message: Token name, like 'Bitcoin' for BTC asset.

decimalsInputDescription.message: A number of decimal places after point. For example: 8 for BTC, 2 for USD.

accountNameInputDescription.message: What will be the name of the new account?

createNewWalletDescription.message: New to Thanos Wallet? Let‚Äôs set it up! This will create a new wallet and seed phrase

delegationInfoWhileMessage.message: fetching or processing your delegation info

operationHistoryWhileMessage.message: fetching or processing operation history from TZStats

privateKeyInputDescription.message: The Secret key of the Account you want to import.

isPrivateKeyEncrypted.message: Your private key in encrypted format?

mnemonicInputDescription.message: Mnemonic. Your secret twelve word phrase.

passwordInputDescription.message: Used for additional mnemonic derivation. That is Not wallet password.

addDerivationPathPrompt.message: By default derivation isn't used. Click on 'Custom derivation path' to add it.

faucetFileInputPrompt.message: Drag & drop a file or select it manually by clicking on the area below. You can download it from

restoreWalletWithSeedPhrase.message: Restore your Wallet with Seed Phrase

accountAddressLabel.message: Your current account address. Share it to receive funds.

revealPrivateKeyDescription.message: Also known as "Export Account", reveals private key for your selected account.

revealSeedPhraseDescription.message: Also known as "Export Wallet", you may need this seed phrase to access your wallet and accounts on other devices.

dAppsDescription.message: In this section you can enable ability to interact with decentralized applications that support Thanos Wallet.

networksDescription.message: In this section you can add or delete custom Tezos networks.

activateAccountDescription.message: Use this section to activate your selected account by providing secret phrase. It may be necessary for ICO/Fundraiser or testnet faucet accounts.

removeAccountDescription.message: Use this section to remove your selected account. Only imported accounts can be removed.

aboutDescription.message: Use this section to view meta info about Thanos Wallet.

unlockPasswordInputDescription.message: A password is used to protect the wallet.

importNewAccountTitle.message: Restore Account? Want to sign in another?

clickIconToResetPermissions.message: Click on the X icon to reset DApp permissions.

importExistingWalletDescription.message: Already have a seed phrase? Import your existing wallet using a 12 or more mnemonic words

failureSecretMayBeInvalid.message: Failed. This may happen because provided Secret is invalid

ifYouWantToActivateAnotherAccount.message: If you want to activate another account - please, select it in the top-right dropdown.

activateAccountSecretDescription.message: 'secret' field from Fundraiser Account or Faucet

feeInputDescription.message: Base Fee for this operation is: %fee%Additional - speeds up its confirmation

selectAnotherAssetPrompt.message: Click on area to select another asset or token.

resetPermissionsConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset permissions?

dAppsCheckmarkPrompt.message: Click on the checkmark to $action$ DApps interaction feature. It‚Äôs still in Alpha, but it can be used for testing and development purposes.

minDelegationAmountDescription.message: Your current balance is less than a minimal delegation amount of this baker. That means while the balance is less than %minAmount% - there will be no payouts.

unknownBakerDescription.message: Provided address is not known to us as a baker! Only delegate funds to it at your own risk.

clickOnBakerPrompt.message: Click on the Baker you want to delegate funds to. This list is powered by %link%

minimalFeeGreaterThanBalance.message: Minimal fee for this transaction is greater than your balance.

alreadyDelegatedFundsToBaker.message: Already delegated funds to this baker. Re-delegation is not possible.

unableToPerformActionToBaker.message: Unable to $action$ to the provided Baker.

minimalFeeGreaterThanBalanceVerbose.message: Minimal fee for this transaction is greater than your balance. A large fee may be due because you sending funds to an empty Manager account. That requires a one-time 0.257 XTZ burn fee;

unableToDelegateToKTAddress.message: Unable to delegate to KT... contract address

unlockWalletPrompt.message: If you want to save something from already existing wallet - %link% and unlock it.

mustBeEqualToPasswordAbove.message: Must be equal to password above

confirmTermsError.message: Unable to continue without confirming Terms of Usage

acceptTermsInputDescription.message:
I have read and agree to
the %termsOfUsageLink% and %privacyPolicyLink%

toRevealNewSeedPhrase.message: to reveal your new Seed Phrase.

writePhraseOnPieceOfPaper.message: Then, write this phrase on a piece of paper and

doNotSharePhrase.message: %doNotShare% this phrase with anyone! It can be used to steal all your accounts.

youWillNeedThisSeedPhrase.message: If you ever switch between browsers or devices, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts.

backupedInputDescription.message:
And accept the risks that if I lose the phrase,
my funds may be lost.

operationHistoryUnavailableForSandbox.message:
Operation history is not available
for local sandbox

timedOutOperationConfirmation.message: Timed out operation confirmation. You can either wait more time or try again later.

ifYouWantToRemoveAnotherAccount.message: If you want to remove another account - select it in the top-right dropdown.

enterPasswordToRemoveAccount.message: Enter password to remove the Account.

ifYouWantToRevealPrivateKeyFromOtherAcco.message: If you want to reveal a private key from another account - you should select it in the top-right dropdown.

doNotSharePrivateKey.message: %doNotShare% this set of chars with anyone! It can be used to steal your current account.

privateKeyFieldDescription.message: Current account key. Keep it secret.

pathForHDAccounts.message: for HD acccounts. This is the thing you use to recover all your accounts from your seed phrase.

tryingToTransferToYourself.message:
You're trying to transfer funds to yourself.
Please, ensure that it's exactly what you want.

clickOnRecipientAccount.message: Click on Account you want to send funds to.

mainAssetBalanceIsZero.message: Your XTZ(main asset) balance is zero. XTZ funds are required for the fee.

unableToPerformTransactionAction.message: Unable to $actionName$ transaction to provided Recipient.

makeSureToBackupSeedPhrase.message: Make sure to back up your seed phrase!

deleteNetworkConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this network?

deleteNetworkHint.message: Click on the X icon to delete the network. If you want to edit network, just delete it and add another with new params.
